build_arg.description: Send arguments to the build, match the Docker native ARG command.

content.description: Content of the Docker file, required unless `file` is provided.

file.description: Path to Dockerfile, required unless `content` is provided.

force_rm.description: Always remove intermediate containers during build.

image.description: Name of the Docker image present in the registry.

quiet.description: Suppress the verbose output generated by the containers.

rm.description: Remove intermediate containers after a successful build.

no_cache.description: Do not use cache when building the repository.

tag.description: Tag of the Docker image, default to latest.
